contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox software | name = Kiten | logo = | screenshot = [[Image:Kiten.ssp.png|200px]] | caption = Kiten 1.2 running on [[SuSE Linux]] 9.3 Professional. | developer = [[KDE]] | programming language = [[C++]] | latest release version = 1.2 | latest release date = | latest preview version = | latest preview date = | operating system = | language = Multilingual | programming language = [[C++]] ([[KDELibs]]) | operating system = [[Cross-platform]] | genre = | license = [[GNU General Public License|GPL]] | website = [http://edu.kde.org/kiten/ Kiten Website] }} '''Kiten''' is a [[Japanese language|Japanese]] [[Kanji]] learning tool and reference for [[KDE Software Compilation]]. It also works as a Japanese-to-[[English language|English]] and English-to-Japanese [[dictionary]]. Users of the program can look up Kanji characters by number of strokes, or by radical. Users can also add Kanji to their "learn" list and get simple "[[flash card]]" type quizzes where the Kanji is displayed and then get a number of possible [[translation]]s to click on. == External links == *[http://edu.kde.org/kiten/ Kiten Website] == See also == [[Gjiten]] the comparable Gnome kanji app {{KDE}} [[Category:KDE software]] [[Category:KDE Software Compilation]] [[Category:KDE Education Project]] [[Category:Japanese language learning resources]] [[Category:Japanese dictionaries]] [[Category:Software that uses Qt]] [[Category:Free educational software]] {{KDE-stub}}
